There could be several reasons why school kids might block all the doors. It is important to note that this statement is quite vague and lacks context. However, here are a few possible explanations:

1. Prank or mischievous behavior: School kids might block all the doors as a prank or act of mischief, intending to disrupt the normal functioning of the school or cause inconvenience to others.

It is important to remember that the specific circumstances and motivations behind why school kids block all the doors can vary greatly, and without further context, it is difficult to provide a definitive answer.
